OK we'll find out for sure when Airly comes on later.

Lady Hawk was being humiliated. Forcing a Hawk to walk was like 
throwing a fish onto land. She was tempted to escape but didn't want 
to take the fight back to Veratis. If she hadn't turned on Squizzy 
the mongoose would make short work of the snake. She was on her own 
for this part of the war.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I thought Najah was just wrapped around her wings and stuff..
> 
> ::Repressor::
> 
> Repressor walks behind Lady Hawk, his gun aimed at her back. If she 
> tried to escape, he'd be ready.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OOC I thought Najah still had Lady Hawk wrapped up so she 
couldn't 
> > walk.
> > 
> > OK if she can then
> > 
> > Lady Hawk walks along covered by repressor, she hoped that she'd 
> get 
> > the chance to escape but not before she took care of Squizzy. As 
> long 
> > as the snake eating rat had the skill to continue the experiments 
> she 
> > couldn't be allowed to exist.
